path: artifacts/MiniZILLA Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.MiniZILLA: contracts/MiniZILLA Full Smart Contract Security Audit/MiniZILLA

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if the excluded addresses list is too long.
findings.location: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` in the MiniZILLA contract
